content:
Russian troops directed a shock drone to the village of Red Lighthouse Kherson region.

About thisinformsKherson Ova.

"A 37-year-old man was injured due to dropping explosives from the drone," the message reads.

The department also added that doctors diagnosed the victim with an explosive injury and a leg wound. He was provided with all the necessary medical care.

Recall droneattackedA minibus with people in Chernihiv: there are victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of a hostile blow to Kherson regiondiedman.
title: Rosarmia directed a shock drone on a red beacon, there is a victim
description: The Kherson Ova informs about it. “Due to dropping explosives from the drone ...
